typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Addresses and quantities must be the same length."

value.value: Addresses and quantities must be the same length.

nodes.documentation:
Deposit multiple tokens to the vault. Quantities should be in the
order of the addresses of the tokens being deposited.
     * @param  _tokenAddresses   Array of the addresses of the ERC20 tokens
@param  _quantities       Array of the number of tokens to deposit
nodes.name: batchDeposit

nodes.documentation:
Withdraw multiple tokens from the vault. Quantities should be in the
order of the addresses of the tokens being withdrawn.
     * @param  _tokenAddresses    Array of the addresses of the ERC20 tokens
@param  _quantities        Array of the number of tokens to withdraw
nodes.name: batchWithdraw
deposit
withdraw
